name: Mini Jam 76: Geometric Bullet Hell
description:
Do give the WebGL version some time to load in, make sure you click into the window to let it load.

Difficulty ramps up over time. Collect purple power-ups to increase your offensive power.

Survive as long as you can!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Q & E - Camera Rotation

Music: Ketsa - Summer Sessions

EDIT: Uploaded executable if web version doesn't work for you.
